at.irian.ankor.base

Class TypeCoercer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.irian.ankor.base.TypeCoercer

  • public class TypeCoercer
extends java.lang.Object
    Coerce an Object to a specific java type. Main usage is to coerce values received from untyped remote systems to strongly typed Java types. The coerce mechanism is heavily influenced by and follows the EL specification (JSR 245, JSR 341).
